name: Simple Patch Hoodie LIMITED EDITION
description: This is a LIMITED EDITION Charcoal and Black Simple Man hoodie. Consists of a leather simple box logo patch on the top left chest, metal string tips, label on left arm and a black front pocket. LIMITED EDITION "SIMPLE" printed on hood. Smaller quantity than normal. Larger, looser hood than normal. Extremely comfortable being 90% cotton 10% polyester. Dry clean only. Made slim fit, and can be purchased a size BIGGER than normal for truer fit.

name: Simple Box Logo Crew Neck Sweater
description: This crew neck sweater consists of a plaid simple box logo patch directly in the middle chest, and plaid elbow patches. Extremely comfortable being 90% cotton 10% polyester. Dry clean only. Made slim fit, and can be purchased a size BIGGER than normal for truer fit. Available in black or grey.

name: Simple Coach Jacket Black
description:
Fall/Winter 2012 Simple Man Clothing Coach Jacket. The first batch of products from the 'Cut and Sew' productions. 

 Made up of a waterproof outer shell, thick black net inside lining, left inside pocket,  leather "Simple." patch on the left chest and Simple Lifestyle Rose logo on the back. 

Available in Black, Red, Blue and Green.
